card_text: You can only use each of the following effects of "Therion "Empress" Alasia" once per turn.$N●You can target 1 "Therion" monster or 1 Reptile monster in your GY; Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, equip that monster to this card.$N●You can discard 1 card, then target 1 "Therion" Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it.$NA "Therion" monster equipped with this card gains 700 ATK, also it can activate the 2nd effect listed above as if it were "Therion "Empress" Alasia".
